body: Japanese laws are ancient, retarded and borderline impossible to change, since that'd require the government to find common ground with each other, so the minimalistic censorship exists solely because it's easier to blink one eye to each other and say "well, it is censored, no laws had been broken".
It's illegal to put out UNCENSORED stuff. Black bar censorship should be perfectly fine.
I'll never understand why artists put light saber censorship on a fucking doujin... this ain't a magazine publication so put those normal black bars ffs
